Intro

Helen Tran

Product Designer & Serial Student

I spend my days at large-ish company looking at how we can change the future of commerce. I primarily focus on the relationships our developers have with our company and build tools to make that experience easier.

In my spare-time, I am usually trapped in a book somewhere.
